original_title: Pramodya to continue in SLC Ex-Co until minister appoints new selection committee
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) Executive Committee has appointed Lasantha Wickremesinghe to the vacant Assistant Treasurer position, which was unfilled at the SLC Annual General Meeting last Saturday.

Wickremesinghe is understood to have withdrawn his name for the post of Treasurer at the AGM, with Sujeewa Godaliyadda taking over that position, but has now been appointed as the Assistant Treasurer.
Pramodya Wickramasinghe will continue to represent the national selection committee in the SLC Ex-Co, until a fresh selection committee is appointed by the Minister.
Mr. Pramodya Wickramasinghe  Chairman – Selection Committee of Sri Lanka Cricket
Mr. Bandula Dissanayake Chairman – Umpires Committee of Sri Lanka Cricket
Mr. Samantha Dodanwela Chairman – Tournament Committee of Sri Lanka Cricket
Mr. Janaka Pathirana Member- (Representative – District and Provincial Cricket Associations)
Mr. Sudath Chandrasekara Member (Representative - Ministry of Sports and Youth Affairs)
